verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> on the first<WH259> day of the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> in the second<WH8145> year<WH8141> after they were come out<WH3318> of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> saying,<WH559>

Take <WH5375> ye<WH853> the sum<WH7218> of all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> with the number<WH4557> of their names,<WH8034> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> by their polls;<WH1538>

From twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that are able to go forth<WH3318> to war<WH6635> in Israel:<WH3478> thou<WH859> and Aaron<WH175> shall number<WH6485> them by their armies.<WH6635>
And with<WH854> you there shall be<WH1961> a man<WH376> of every<WH376> tribe;<WH4294> every one<WH376> head<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of his fathers.<WH1>
And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the men<WH376> that<WH834> shall stand<WH5975> with<WH854> you: of the tribe of Reuben;<WH7205> Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur.<WH7707>
Of Simeon;<WH8095> Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai.<WH6701>
Of Judah;<WH3063> Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab.<WH5992>
Of Issachar;<WH3485> Nethaneel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar.<WH6686>
Of Zebulun;<WH2074> Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon.<WH2497>
Of the children<WH1121> of Joseph:<WH3130> of Ephraim;<WH669> Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud:<WH5989> of Manasseh;<WH4519> Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur.<WH6301>
Of Benjamin;<WH1144> Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni.<WH1441>
Of Dan;<WH1835> Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai.<WH5996>
Of Asher;<WH836> Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ocran.<WH5918>
Of Gad;<WH1410> Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Deuel.<WH1845>
Of Naphtali;<WH5321> Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan.<WH5881>
These <WH428> were the renowned<WH7121> of the congregation,<WH5712> princes<WH5387> of the tribes<WH4294> of their fathers,<WH1> heads<WH7218> of thousands<WH505> in Israel.<WH3478>
And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> took<WH3947> <WH853> these<WH428> men<WH376> which<WH834> are expressed<WH5344> by their names: <WH8034>

And they assembled<WH6950> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> together on the first<WH259> day of the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> and they declared their pedigrees<WH3205> after<WH5921> their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> by their polls.<WH1538>
As <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses,<WH4872> so he numbered<WH6485> them in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai.<WH5514>

And the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> Israel's<WH3478> eldest son,<WH1060> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> by their polls,<WH1538> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> were forty<WH705> and six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> by their polls,<WH1538> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Simeon,<WH8095> were fifty<WH2572> and nine<WH8672> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> were forty<WH705> and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572>

Of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah,<WH3063> were threescore and fourteen<WH7657> <WH702> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Issachar,<WH3485> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar,<WH3485> were fifty<WH2572> and four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun,<WH2074> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun,<WH2074> were fifty<WH2572> and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> namely, of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim,<WH669> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim,<WH669> were forty<WH705> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh,<WH4519> were thirty<WH7970> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> and two hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin,<WH1144> were thirty<WH7970> and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan,<WH1835> were threescore<WH8346> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Asher,<WH836> by their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Asher,<WH836> were forty<WH705> and one<WH259> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>

Of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali,<WH5321> throughout their generations,<WH8435> after their families,<WH4940> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> according to the number<WH4557> of the names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war;<WH6635>
Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, even of the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali,<WH5321> were fifty<WH2572> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

These <WH428> are those that were numbered,<WH6485> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered,<WH6485> and the princes<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> being twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> men:<WH376> each<WH376> one<WH259> was<WH1961> for the house<WH1004> of his fathers.<WH1>

So were<WH1961> all<WH3605> those that were numbered<WH6485> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> all<WH3605> that were able to go forth<WH3318> to war<WH6635> in Israel;<WH3478>
Even all<WH3605> they that were numbered<WH6485> were<WH1961> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572>
But the Levites<WH3881> after the tribe<WH4294> of their fathers<WH1> were not<WH3808> numbered<WH6485> among<WH8432> them.
For the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Only <WH389> thou shalt not<WH3808> number<WH6485> <WH853> the tribe<WH4294> of Levi,<WH3878> neither<WH3808> take<WH5375> the sum<WH7218> of them among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

But thou<WH859> shalt appoint<WH6485> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> over<WH5921> the tabernacle<WH4908> of testimony,<WH5715> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof, and over<WH5921> all things<WH3605> that<WH834> belong to it: they<WH1992> shall bear<WH5375> <WH853> the tabernacle,<WH4908> and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof; and they<WH1992> shall minister<WH8334> unto it, and shall encamp<WH2583> round about<WH5439> the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And when the tabernacle<WH4908> setteth forward,<WH5265> the Levites<WH3881> shall take it down:<WH3381> <WH853> and when the tabernacle<WH4908> is to be pitched,<WH2583> the Levites<WH3881> shall set it up:<WH6965> <WH853> and the stranger<WH2114> that cometh nigh<WH7131> shall be put to death.<WH4191>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall pitch their tents,<WH2583> every man<WH376> by<WH5921> his own camp,<WH4264> and every man<WH376> by<WH5921> his own standard,<WH1714> throughout their hosts.<WH6635>

But the Levites<WH3881> shall pitch<WH2583> round about<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH4908> of testimony,<WH5715> that there be<WH1961> no<WH3808> wrath<WH7110> upon<WH5921> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> and the Levites<WH3881> shall keep<WH8104> <WH853> the charge<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of testimony.<WH5715>
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> did<WH6213> they.
